main event: An oblong object was observed passing through the sky, described as being the size of a 25 cent piece with a red color and a tail of fire like a meteor.
interesting points: The object was seen for only about 10 seconds., The sighting occurred in Artesia, New Mexico on November 6, 1957., The object was classified as a meteor sighting in the evaluation., The duration of the observation was unusually brief for an object of its type., There were numerous UFO reports in the area within the previous 72 hours.
sighted object: an oblong red object with a fiery tail
witness description: The witness was a resident of Artesia.
